mapper.select: select pmb.* ,dept.dept_name,dept.dept_no ,sc.staff_no,sc.staff_name, pms.join_datetime,pms.change_time,pms.old_salary,pms.new_salary,pms.curr_salary,pms.description, pms.work_days,pms.old_days,pms.new_days from personnel_monthly_base pmb inner join personnel_monthly_salary pms on pmb.id = pms.id inner join tb_other_staff sc on pmb.staff_id = sc.staff_id left JOIN ts_dept dept on pmb.dept_id = dept.dept_id where pms.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into personnel_monthly_salary( id,join_datetime, work_days,old_days,new_days, change_time,old_salary, new_salary,curr_salary,description )values ( #{id},#{join_datetime}, #{work_days},#{old_days},#{new_days}, #{change_time},#{old_salary}, #{new_salary},#{curr_salary},#{description} )
mapper.update: update personnel_monthly_salary set join_datetime=#{join_datetime}, work_days=#{work_days}, old_days=#{old_days}, new_days=#{new_days}, change_time=#{change_time}, old_salary=#{old_salary}, new_salary=#{new_salary}, curr_salary=#{curr_salary}, description=#{description} where id=#{id}
